text:
I don't work on custom email development often, so forgive me if there is an easy answer to this...

But, is there really not a way to add custom CSS to the head of a drag and drop email in HubSpot?

I know I could create a custom email HTML template... but for a minor CSS tweak to existing D&D email layout, is there a good solution for this?

I have tried creating an email custom module with
```{% require_head %}
   <style>
      ...styles...
   </style>
{% end_require_head %}```
But still no dice... Email custom module with CSS in the body is not good practice, so that won't work either.
I’ve attempted to do this as well and could never get it to work.
It won’t work sadly - also if you try to put a CSS style block in the main body, Gmail will ignore it.
